settings.heading: Your Full Service Importing, Processing & Packaging Partner

settings.text: Your needs and specifications are met at our state of the art facility. We offer an array of processing and treatment options to provide organic ingredients that meet your business needs.

settings.heading: Product Development
settings.content: Launching a new line? From ingredient sourcing to custom packaging we have you covered.

settings.heading: Blending
settings.content: We've been in this business a while and so have our blend masters. Send us your blend and we will be happy to match it. Looking to develop a new flavor profile? Our team is legendary on the development of flavorful, nicely textured & colored culinary, tea & herbal blends.

settings.heading: Ingredient Cleaning
settings.content: In order to deliver clean goods, we designed our production lines with separation capabilities that insure removal of impurities and foreign objects. Your product will and pass numerous safety steps and metal check before final packaging.

settings.heading: Roasting
settings.content: Like your Garlic roasted? Our in house, smokeless roasting technology allows us to create different flavors. Roasted items include Chicory, Marshmallow, Dandelion, Chiles, Paprika, Carob and Garlic.

settings.heading: Private Labeling
settings.content: When you need to let your company shine, ask us to package with your own labels. Our quality organic ingredients can arrive at your warehouse with your own labeling, ready to be sold under your name. White labeling is also available upon request.

settings.heading: Co-Packaging
settings.content: We offer private label services, offering a variety of industries with multiple packaging options. Whether you are looking to pack single ingredients or blends, we are happy to be growing this aspect of our service offering.

settings.heading: Ingredient Sourcing
settings.content: We consider our decades of experience in global sourcing our expertise. We pride ourselves in our robust network and have fostered long term relationships to deliver multi origin sourced ingredients. We know our producers and how to provide quality you need at a competitive price. Fair Trade, Fair for Life, Rainforest Alliance, Fair Wilde, Regenerative, Impact Driven, we've got you covered. If there's an ingredient that isn't on our list, don't hesitate to ask.

settings.heading: Micro Reduction
settings.content: Verified clean products only. All our organic ingredients are treated and tested to ensure food safety. We offer multiple treatment options including a modern Infra-Red and water treatment that is proven to be gentle on the precious ingredients. Our treatment in 3rd party verified for every lot.

settings.heading: Metal Detection
settings.content: All goods go through a NIST certified and FDA approved Gravity detector. Additionally all mills and processing machinery are fitted with industrial strength magnets. Sifting at multiple production steps further insures absolute purity of your ingredients.
